title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse - a versatile and ergonomic device that revolutionizes your computing experience! This state-of-the-art mouse offers both PS/2 and USB connectivity, ensuring easy integration with a wide range of systems.

Boasting an impressive 300 DPI resolution, the Trackman Marble provides precise cursor control, making it perfect for detailed work or casual browsing. Choose from a stylish selection of colors – red, gray, and white – to match your personal style or workspace aesthetic.

Measuring just 7 inches in length, 2.5 inches in height, and 4 inches in width, this compact mouse is designed for comfort and efficiency. Its unique trackball design eliminates the need for a mousepad, saving you valuable desk space. Plus, with side-to-side scrolling capabilities, navigating documents and webpages has never been easier.

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 is designed with ambidextrous functionality, featuring two buttons that cater to both left-handed and right-handed users. This makes it an ideal choice for shared workspaces or households with multiple users.

Made in China, this reliable and durable mouse is built to withstand the rigors of daily use. Upgrade your computing experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse – a must-have accessory for any tech-savvy individual!
